overview: Saintbrix Publishing & Recording Entertainment (or more commonly known as SPR. Ent) is a record label founded by the rapper Saintbrix. Even though the company was created accidentally, this accident is growing into much more and will become then next big thing in the music industry. On June 11, 2007, Saintbrix was just trying to further establish himself within music when a new addition that so many artist rarely get to have came and threw him off unexpectedly. Whilst trying to obtain his performer license he accidentally filed for his own company as well. Unaware of this arrangement at the moment, Saintbrix didnâ€™t get enlightened until the documents where his performer license name came as well as his company license. In hopes of this being a mistake or an error, a relative of the rapper told him of his â€œmistakeâ€ and said, â€œBrandon, by the look of this youâ€™ve just got yourself a company. As of now the company is heading into bigger and better things and into a more established ground in entertainment. So far Saintbrix is the CEO and founder of the company as well as having a partnership with N-EFFECT Productionsâ€™ CEO Ms. Sharon. The company has its own booking agency under the direction of Ms. Alisha Blankney and a A&R representative Gerald Pinckney. Music Production is also overseen by Saintbrix and co-producer Vickie Mason is also a Marketing Director for the company too. SPR. Ent is growing and accumulating more workers as we speak.
